TopicTitle: that guy who has an account but doesn't post...

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

well, as the title says I joined almost two years ago to post some ugly artwork and after that never posted anything else. Anyway I started playing KSP for the first time when the demo was still 0.14 (I guess?) and two weeks later bought the full game while being slightly intoxicated (If I can't say that due to forum rules, I'm sorry, Let me know). And to this day I'm really happy I did!

The first couple of months were the usual: Launching, Crashing, Going straight up to get an Ap of 400km and don't understanding how orbital mechanics work. But after a lot of research - and videos from our best know youtuber - I figured it out and got to really appreciate the scope of the game.

Nowadays my gameplay is kinda weird as I:

1. See an amazing mod.

2. Install said mod.

3. The game crashes.

4. Reinstall Game + mods.

5. Game crashes

6. Fix the game through luck.

7. Play the game for a week.

8. See new mod.

9. repeat.

10. Profit?

Anyway, I'll probably be sticking around for a while.

TLDR: Hi, I'm new. Please be gentle

In any case, it's always good to welcome another lurker into the fold.

Happy landings!
